text: Pasolini is an Italian surname. Notable people with this surname include: *Angelo Pasolini (born 1905), Italian football player *Pier Paolo Pasolini (1922–1975), Italian film director and writer *Renzo Pasolini (1938–1973), Italian motorcycle road racer *Uberto Pasolini (born 1957), Italian film producer and director Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Pasolini (surname)
